name: phenylacetonitrile,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase [(R)-mandelonitrile-forming]
definition: Phenylacetonitrile + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Mandelonitrile + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the last step of three-step reaction (see R11732, R10041+R07638+R11733)
